text: Ildar Rinasovich Arslanov (; born 6 April 1994) is a Russian former professional racing cyclist, who competed professionally between 2014 and 2019 for the and teams. ==Major results== ;2011 : 1st 20px Road race, National Junior Road Championships ;2012 : 1st 20px Road race, National Junior Road Championships ;2013 : 5th Overall Grand Prix of Adygeya ;2014 : 1st Stage 4 (ITT) Giro della Valle d'Aosta ;2015 : 7th GP Capodarco : 9th Trofeo Banca Popolare di Vicenza ;2016 : 5th Overall Tour d'Azerbaïdjan ::1st 20px Young rider classification ;2017 : 5th Overall Tour of Turkey ;2018 : 3rd Overall Adriatica Ionica Race : 9th Overall Tour of Slovenia ;2019 : 4th Overall Sibiu Cycling Tour : 8th Trofeo Laigueglia ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Agidel Category:Russian male cyclists
title: Ildar Arslanov
